name: Museum of Performance & Design
description: Founded 1947, preserves Bay Area performing arts history with 3.5 million items including photos, costumes, and archives from SF Ballet, Opera, and more.
fullDescription: Founded 1947, preserves Bay Area performing arts history with 3.5 million items including photos, costumes, and archives from SF Ballet, Opera, and more.
address: 2200 Jerrold Avenue Ste T, San Francisco, CA 94124
